name: Simplify Me.
description: Simplify Me. is a comprehensive productivity application meticulously designed to streamline complex workflows and significantly enhance user efficiency. It features a deliberately minimalist interface paired with powerful, robust backend capabilities.
keyFeatures: Advanced task management with customizable boards
Real-time team collaboration and communication channels
Deep, insightful analytics to track productivity trends
Seamless integration with popular third-party tools
techStack: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, Node.js
outcomes: Achieved a 40% increase in user engagement within the first three months post-launch. The streamlined task management system reduced average task completion time by 25%. Recognized for its intuitive design and robust performance.

name: Vernato
description: Vernato is a boutique e-commerce platform that empowers local artisans by providing them with a beautiful and functional digital space to sell their unique creations. The core mission was to create an exceptionally user-friendly experience for both the artisans selling their products and the customers buying them.
keyFeatures: Multi-vendor support with individual artisan dashboards
Secure and reliable payment processing with Stripe
A highly responsive and aesthetically pleasing storefront design
Product and inventory management tools for sellers
techStack: React, Redux, Express, MongoDB, Stripe API
outcomes: Onboarded over 100 artisans in the first year. Processed over $50,000 in transactions with a 99.9% uptime. The platform was praised for its aesthetic and ease of use, leading to high seller retention.

name: EMTY
description: EMTY is a high-fidelity prototype designed to visualize real-time transit data from the MTA API. The prototype was built using a combination of design and database tools to simulate a live data environment. It demonstrates a concept for an intuitive user interface for tracking and understanding public transportation movements.
keyFeatures: Live visualization of transit data on an interactive map
User-friendly interface for tracking and filtering routes
Built with a focus on design and data simulation
techStack: Figma, Canva, Firestore, Firebase Realtime Database, MTA API
outcomes: Successfully created a proof-of-concept that demonstrates the feasibility of a live transit tracking application. The prototype was used to secure stakeholder buy-in for a full-scale development project. The design was praised for its clarity and user-centric approach.

name: GitHub Contributions
description: My GitHub profile is a testament to my passion for coding and continuous learning. It hosts a variety of projects, from small utility scripts to larger applications and contributions to open-source libraries. It showcases my proficiency in different languages and frameworks.
keyFeatures: Maintenance of several personal utility projects
Demonstration of skills in multiple programming languages
techStack: Git, GitHub Actions, Various Languages (JS, TS, Python)
outcomes: Actively maintained several open-source projects. Contributed to popular libraries, gaining experience in collaborative development workflows. My profile reflects a strong commitment to quality code and best practices.
